Summary: lsyncd 2.1.6 is available, fixes security vulnerability CVE-2014-8990
cvc4: FTBFS - cc1plus: error: -Wformat-security ignored without -Wformat [-Werror=format-security]
heap overflow security issue in date(1) and touch(1)
FTBFS: libuser doesn't build on current F26 due to -Werror=format-security
